alert.note: Alert for Dunn; Pierce; St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:54PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Pierce, central Dunn and southern St. Croix Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 654 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Glenwood City to near Hammond to near Hudson. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Glenwood City around 700 PM CDT. Boyceville around 705 PM CDT. Baldwin and Knapp around 710 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Woodville and Menomonie. This includes Interstate 94 in Wisconsin between mile markers 1 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for west central Wisconsin.
